name: Removal Masters
description:
Removal masters is a top-down Removal man game, where you must load your vehicle efficiently to gain points but you will have points deducted for taking too long.

This game was made for the 2021 Epic MegaJam with the theme "Running out of space". 

I have been waiting for the Epic MegaJam for months and it happens over a weekend that I was on holiday, so I lost 3 days out of the 7. So please forgive the clunkiness for character :) Thank you!
